titles.title: Southwestern Power Administration Fund Establishment Act
Southwestern Power Administration Fund Establishment Act
A bill to establish the Southwestern Power Administration Fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Southwestern Power Administration Fund Establishment Act
This bill establishes a fund that the Southwestern Power Administration may use for the operation and maintenance of power transmission facilities and other related expenses. The bill also transfers amounts into the fund from specified accounts.
